ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bug'em !!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Won t help. It s pretty obvious absolutely no one reads the output of the /bug command at Verant anyway. It s quite likely the email the /bug command
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, May 20/00, Olmoss@... wrote:
>
> /BUG Bard songs are still broken. Have been since Thanksgiving !
> Seven months is long enough. Have Abashi and McQuade read
> "According to Abashi Verant is better at fixing bugs" on station
> forum
> for details, Please.
>
> If you don't want to be original you can
> Highlight and control C to copy and control V to paste the above
> once in game (I hope)
>

Won't help. It's pretty obvious absolutely no one reads the output of
the /bug command at Verant anyway. It's quite likely the email the /bug
command generates is routed to /dev/null.


--
